title: 'username or password incorrect'
body: So I had a client crash and tried to relog, it says my info is wrong... Thanks Riot, rip ranked winstreak, leaver penalty and x9 report. I feel sorry for my team having to play without a support -,-

replies.body: I've put over 250â‚¬ in this game, yet I'm sure i'll get a ban because of these dumb crashes and then someone will be like 'oh it was the system, i cant reverse it hurdur'
hes just trying to help u get ur stuff back. no need to be an asshole

I went ahead and pulled up your account to see what was going on with that 'crash', and it looks like someone else might have been able to get your login info somehow and signed into your account, which bumped you out. 

I'd strongly suggest that you secure your account through the [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) to make sure there aren't aren't any damages taking place!
